note.p: Italian collector and museum curator. Qualified as a lawyer in 1851. Collected scientific specimens. Founder member of the Società dei Naturalisti in Modena, 1865; president 1870–80. Curator of the palaeological collections, Museo Civico di Modena, from 1869; director from at least 1874.
Atti della Società dei Naturalisti e Matematici di Modena, 1870–80
